name: Ray Izard
text: Won't deliver to the truck terminals three miles away!  Maybe we should stop hauling your food!

name: Richard Stephens
text: Flummoxed and confused by all the poor reviews. Photo enclosed shows my lunch -- too much for me to eat --prepared by a really nice young guy wearing glasses. Had a tremendous experience at this location and recommend it, especially lunch time.

name: Paul Maldonado
text: last night was our first time we went to this place. But It is no doubt not the last. We enjoyed the evening very much with the courteous service, with the fine cooking and booze and with the modest price. We will no doubt go back there again.

name: Jason White
text: I like Pizza Hut Pizza when it's made correctly.  This location can't get sauce on their pizzas.  It's always dry.  I've taken to ordering extra sauce and then adding extra sauce in the comments section of the online ordering system.  They …More

name: Mary Fairchild
text: Happy Labor Day Weekend.

name: Kristin Pfannenstiel
text: This is the hottest pizza I've ever ordered!

name: Aspen Paine
text: I worked here in 2017 when Travis was the manager and he sucked. The manager is a different guy now so I'm like 110% sure it's better because nobody can be as bad as Travis. That is all.

name: Gayle Gaulding
text: Moved within the delivery area of this location two years ago.  One of the first times I ordered, I ordered online before 11 am I think.  Received a call from the manager saying they were busy with a school order or something and wanted to …More

name: Ury Abs
text: This Place has gotten sooo much better this past year. New crew I guess

name: Dylan Ashbaugh
text: I am the store manager here (RGM). If we ever mess up cause we all make mistakes. We will do our best to fix it. Just please contact us as soon as the issue happens. We apologize for any inconveniences that are caused by our service and …More

name: Tyler Thimesch
text: Ordered my pizza, drinks and dipping sauces at 6:43, my order was at my door in 16 minutes, excellent! The driver even said he packed the box and my dipping sauces we're inside. Great delivery time, and very courteous delivery driver. Keep up the good work.

name: Joseph Ramirez
text: Although the customer service was great... they always refused to deliver what I ordered in the morning. You should always be able to deliver no matter how much people order.

name: Adam Watson
text: Read all the one star reviews. Had most of them happen to me at this location. My son likes this pizza, but he's gonna have to get used to somebody that's actually good.

name: Katie Elizabeth
text: Since last year they have had new management. And better customer service. The only problem I had was with the rude snobby ladies next store while waiting out side for my order.

name: Michael Kenfe
text: I really hate to give them two stars. Normally the service at this location is excellent, but my last visit was horrible. My issue is with the lady working there today 4/21 at 730pm. I'm used to being shown my pizza when I request carry …More

name: Nate Ostrander
text: The place is relatively small.  It has only a bench to sit at while they prep your food.   No actual eating area.  The service is good though.  I walked in with an order and they had it in and started cooking immediately.

name: Vickki McNair
text: Really cool 2 earn points towards free pizza!!

name: Lee Iv
text: I have ordered here 4 or 5 times, and every single time they get my order wrong or just give me a messed up pizza. So when I ordered Spanish and extra cheese I get three leaves of Spanish and no extra cheese. The pizza hut 800 number has …More

name: Shautay Wade
text: This thin n crispy FIRRRE

name: Jared Kircher
text: I am quite the fan of pizza and they sell that here.

name: Mike Cunningham
text: My favorite is supreme on thin and crispy crust.  If you ask for extra sauce after they ring you up... they usually throw it in for free.

name: Sarah Arora
text: Never answer their phone, order always take more than twice as long as they quote when the call finally gets forwarded to corporate. Ordered tonight, was told pick up would be ready in 20 minutes, we go to pick it up to be told they are out …More

name: Marie Hood
text: Terrible

name: Jessica Maureen
text: They do Not even deserve one star. This place should be shut down. I have recieved food poisoning on one occasion, which doesn't surprise me because everytime I go in there for carryout the employees are stoned and reek of weed. The …More

name: Cade Robinson
text: For a pizza hut pizza it was pretty good, get the bbq chicken pizza its fire

name: Daniel Singleton
text: enjoyed the service and food is the best

name: Joy Hall
text: I'd rather give Zero stars! Not one time have we gotten our pizza on time! Today was 50 minutes past the said time. It's ridiculous! The employees at this particular store are rude and dismissive. …More

name: Jessica Salazar-Dominguez
text: Many workers smoke directly infront of the business. Workers seem very unprofessional how that greet the guest. The delivery drivers have parked in the handicapped space more than once.

name: Dani La Londe
text: I ordered Pizza that exceeded the delivery time twice over. Will never order delivery from this location again. They state that I did not include an apartment address when I clearly did state via the site. This is a dishonest location and …More

name: Lewis Booth
text: I ordered a large 2 topping pizza last night with an order of cheese sticks at 6pm. My order did not arrive until 8pm. Every time I order from this store I have to call and ask where my food is or why it's taking them so long. I do not know …More

name: Melissa Rice
text: I stay in Lenexa so when I do delivery unfortunately it gets assigned to this location. They are absolutely horrible. I just called to cancel my order after it’s 30 minutes late. They are having side conversations while I’m on the phone. …More

name: Michael Taylor
text: It's Pizza Hut.

name: Mackenzie Jamerson
text: Both my boyfriend and I got food poisoning from the pizza we ordered last night. I have been throwing up all day. Will never get Pizza Hut again.

name: Andrew Hill
text: Picked up my pizza from Riley. Super nice guy, great attitude.

name: Michael Ponce
text: Sometimes there are issues when they're busy but the pizza is always on time. The staff members are always nice and they try their best to make-up for their mistakes.

name: Noah Bisel
text: I've had decent experiences in the past, but my last visit was so atrocious that I felt compelled to review. I stood at the front in plain view of an employee for 11 minutes without being helped. He motioned at me twice as if to say "one …More

name: Joel Lebeau
text: I really don't understand why everyone is hating on this location. It's honestly my favorite Pizza Hut Location! If you always find a problem with your food, then maybe YOU are the problem.

name: Teri McCarthy
text: Do NOT use this Pizza Hut!! I ordered on line, they charged my credit card, my pizza never showed up and when I called the store I could not get a clear answer from anyone what happened. When I asked to speak to the manager, I was told HE …More

name: Renny Stone
text: This was the worst Pizza Hut experience I have ever had. The dough was thin, cheap, and had no flavor. Our cheese sticks tasted as if they were cooked in the pan that the dessert breadsticks were cooked in and not washed. I am a frequent …More

name: Owlen Oot
text: Ordered it at 100. Estimated delivery 224. I called twice. Got updated. Got 5 $ off. Got it at 320. It was cold. Thank goodness im not starving anymore. But they need to fire theyre delivery staff cause they all called out today. So i was told. They were nice...but service was poor. Though i feel bad for them.

name: Matt Boveri
text: I moved into the area a while back. The pizza is always slow, so I started showing 5+ minutes after it is supposed to be done; however, lately not only are they slow, but now they are regularly making mistakes on the orders.

name: Rita Marlier
text: Horrible experience from this location, will not be ordering from here again. The person who answered the phone immediately put me on hold for over 10mins, so I hung up. Called again multiple times without an answer. I was calling to check …More

name: jason barmann
text: The lady who answered was rude,not sure  if call center or actual store. Called back twice because it was late.  Stated it had to be 20 minutes before a discount offered. Then they didn't put the phone on hold and was talking about weed. The worst experience ever with any pizza store.

name: Matthew Wessley
text: Most people wont have the same issue I have had. We moved to this area about 4 months ago and have ordered pizza here three seperate occasions. I have had marinara provided every time except this particular time in which I was informed that …More

name: Reanna Jefferson
text: I am a pizza lover and Pizza Hut happens to be my most favorite pizza place for delivery and/or carryout. HOWEVER,  this location is absolutely a poor representation of the Pizza Hut brand...from the customer service experience in store or …More

name: Miranda Foster
text: Always a hit at my house.

name: Clint McAlister
text: This was the absolute worst pizza I've ever had. I'm not picky but it was all burnt and dried up. Horrible. I can't believe they delivered this to our house.

name: chriscorbett100
text: The service we terrible from start to finish. "Mark from the regional call center" (which I believe was a total lie" was EXTREMELY rude and did not help. DO NOT ORDER FROM THEM! I will be contacting the regional manager!

name: Rob Dobson
text: Wow. I thought the other negative reviews were exaggerating. They weren't. I order my pizza 35 minutes ago. Arrived and paid 15 minutes ago. And now someone is just making my pizza. Pathetic! PH needs to shut this location down.

name: Nia Strahl
text: Absolutely terrible. Messed up an order of two pizzas three times in a row. The last time, I didn’t even receive two pizzas!

name: William saxbury
text: Called for delivery & they cant handle it.. I'm 3 miles from them & im out of their area!!! Looked up pizza hut on gps & they are closest to me. I guess unless your in tge parking lot they cant deliver to you

name: austin c
text: I ordered a pizza at 930 pm. And the store doesn't close until 11. And when I showed up at 10 to get it they said it was too late and they were closed, and refused to let me in the store. I won't be going back to this one again

name: Tyler Dill
text: It's literally been two and a half hours and we have yet to receive our order. Not to mention why not try to answer your phone for once.

name: Ryan Maples
text: Always a 2 hour delivery wait time and whoever answers the phone is always unprofessional. The location just needs to be shut down.

name: Nate Turpin
text: Do not order from this place, warning you had 2 hours for pizza to deliver. Finally got my pizza was crap dried, hard, burnt, cold. Wings were cold chewy and tasted like cleaning chemicals. The pasta we ordered was still frozen. worst pizza hut I'v ever ordered from pizza hut...

name: Chelsea Winner
text: Called in my order for pick up and when I got to the store they said they had no record of my ordered. The guy at the front asked if I was sure I placed it there when I told him I'm sure I placed it there he was rude. Never ordering from this location again.

name: Rog Wohler
text: good food.

name: Remember Lads Subscribe to Big Bear
text: Nobody out pizzas the hut

name: james Brazeal
text: Ordered Six pizzas, got five pizzas and one empty box. Not happy.

name: Reesha B.
text: Cashier had dirty nails, I hate this location! I live nearly walking distance & I will drive all the way to the 63rd location. I've had pizza that was not cooked in the middle. This location is dirty! Don't go!

name: Willie Hayes
text: Great customer service

name: Ricardo Gonzaga
text: Customer service needs improvement. They don't open the pizza box to make sure your carry out is what you ordered.

name: Mike Harvey
text: Incredibly rude counter person! Won’t be going back to THAT store!

name: Jillian Greer
text: Kind of strange employees

name: Mike Sanchez
text: Amazing

name: RAW CUT
text: BEST.FOOD.EVER.

name: Sean Dougherty
text: Ordered 7 pizzas  on 06/30/2017 order was complete and correct ahead of schedule. 👍

text: Two weeks in a row ordered online and arrived at the time given, our pizzas hadn't even been started.

name: kelly fadous
text: It's pizza hut,,,,,   don't expect much

name: Brandy Robinson
text: I have been waiting for my pizza for over 2 hours

text: Unreasonable amount of time for delivery.

name: Craig Sargent
text: This Pizza Hut is the absolute worst, get carry out from the 87th street location 5 terrible experiences with this location.
